mapper.select: select * from item order by createtime desc limit #{arg0}, #{arg1}

select title, item.createtime, description, onsale, price, user.nickname, user.avatar, gi.grade from item left join user on item.userid = user.id left join (select substr(id, 3, 2) as grade, id from user) as gi on item.userid = gi.id where item.id = #{arg0}
